About Me

I am a Programmer! I have no life!

BIO

I am a motivated and disciplined programmer who is continually looking for ways to improve myself and inspire people around me. I attempt to put myself through obstacles that force me to venture outside of my comfort zone, forcing me to strive to be someone who is knowledgeable in all areas rather than just one.
